title: Bienvenida al Blog
snippet: Contenido del BlogTe doy la más cordial bienvenida a mi blog, pħyfth. En este espacio encontrarás material académico. title: Customize the Favicon
snippet: In Chirpy, the image files of Favicons are placed in assets/img/favicons/. You may need to replace them with your own. So let’s see how to customize these Favicons.With a square image (PNG, JPG or GIF) in hand, open the site Favicon &amp; App Icon Generator and upload your original image.Clic...

title: Writing a New Post
snippet: Naming and PathCreate a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _post/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown. From v2.4.1, you can create sub-directories under _posts/ to categorize posts.Front MatterBasically, you need to fill th...
